mapper.update: UPDATE t_meeting_detail SET delete_flg = 1, last_modified_user = #{lastModifiedUser}, last_modified_date = #{lastModifiedDate} WHERE meeting_id = #{meetingId} AND delete_flg = 0
mapper.select: SELECT t1.meeting_detail_id, t1.meeting_id, t1.question, t1.answer, t1.follow, t1.question_type FROM t_meeting_detail t1 WHERE t1.meeting_id = #{meetingId} AND t1.delete_flg = #{deleteFlg} ORDER BY t1.first_create_date ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_meeting_detail ( meeting_id, question, answer, follow, question_type, account_id, delete_flg, first_create_user, first_create_date, last_modified_user, last_modified_date ) VALUES ( #{meetingId}, #{question}, #{answer}, #{follow}, #{questionType}, #{accountId}, #{deleteFlg}, #{firstCreateUser}, #{firstCreateDate}, #{lastModifiedUser}, #{lastModifiedDate} )
